title: [[ Somerville/Union Square 2 Bedroom - Open Concept - Central Air ]]
posting_body: ['Somerville/Union Square 2 Bedroom - Open Concept - Central Air', 'Somerville / Union Square /', 'Available:', '9/1/2022', '||', '  Fee:', 'Full Fee', '||', '  Reference:', '#175847', 'Apartment Details', 'Fee:', 'Full Fee', 'Kitchen:', 'Open Concept.', ' Appliances include:  Refrigerator, Natural Gas Stove, Dishwasher, Garbage Disposal, Microwave.', 'Location:', 'Somerville/Union Square', 'Bath:', '1', 'Bedrooms:', '2', 'Reference:', '#175847', 'Available:', 'September 01, 2022', 'Features', 'Cats are negotiable with Landlord.', '1 minute walk to Major Bus Routes.', '18 minute walk to the T.', 'Permit Street Parking.', 'Washer free in basement, Dryer free in basement, Cable Ready, Central.', 'Apartment Summary', 'Located in the Union Square area of Somerville.', ' 1st floor apartment in a 3 family house on a quiet dead-end street close to Union Sq.', ' Updated open concept kitchen with dishwasher, disposal and microwave.', " Free laundry is in the basement and there's also central air!", ' Easy access to Union Sq and a quick walk to Porter Sq.', '  Cats are negotiable.', ' (Reference #175847)', 'Contact Information', 'Call:', '857-547-8682', 'Please mention reference #', '175847', 'HUD:', 'Equal Housing Opportunity']
